slider.overview:
Event List Page

This page displays a paginated set of upcoming events for a given Location.

feed.name: Event Search
feed.overview: Calls the Event Search feed using the locationId in the request.

feed.name: Destination Menu
feed.overview: Calls the Destination Menu feed using the locationId in the request.

feed.name: Audience interest Search
feed.overview: Calls the Audience interest Search feed using the audienceInterestId

feed.name: Clanedar Event Search
feed.overview: Calls the Calendar event search, which counts the events per day
